H0.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. Dwight D. Eisenhower

H1.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. Harry S. Truman

H2.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. Richard Nixon

H3.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. JFK

A4.text: In August 1961, after East German troops erected the Berlin Wall, Kennedy sent an army convoy to reassure West Berliners of U.S. support.

A5.text: In a July 1961 speech, Kennedy announced his decision to add $3.25 billion (equivalent to $34.2 billion in 2024) to the defense budget, along with over 200,000 additional troops, stating that an attack on West Berlin would be taken as an attack on the U.S.
